org.opendaylight.controller.protocol_plugin.openflow

Interface ITopologyServiceShimListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TopologyServices

    public interface ITopologyServiceShimListener
    The Interface provides Edge updates to the topology listeners

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void edgeOverUtilized(Edge edge)
      Called when an Edge utilization is above the safe threshold configured on the controller
      void edgeUpdate(java.util.List<TopoEdgeUpdate> topoedgeupdateList)
      Called to update on Edge in the topology graph
      void edgeUtilBackToNormal(Edge edge)
      Called when the Edge utilization is back to normal, below the safety threshold level configured on the controller

    • Method Detail

      • edgeUpdate

        void edgeUpdate(java.util.List<TopoEdgeUpdate> topoedgeupdateList)
        Called to update on Edge in the topology graph
        Parameters:
        topoedgeupdateList - List of topoedgeupdates Each topoedgeupdate includes edge, its Properties ( BandWidth and/or Latency etc) and update type.
